title: 'Broken Promises' for Wales (with Vaughan Gething MS)
itunes:title: 'Broken Promises' for Wales (with Vaughan Gething MS)
description:
Welsh Minister for Economy Vaughan Gething says Westminster has been willing to take greater risks with public health than Wales. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that the U.K. government has broken its 2019 manifesto promise to deliver the same level of funding to nations and regions regardless of Brexit.

Plus, Louise Blair, Covid-19 vaccine and variants leader at Airfinity, says there is more inoculation innovation to come.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Welsh Minister for Economy Vaughan Gething says Westminster has been willing to take greater risks with public health than Wales. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that the U.K. government has broken its 2019 manifesto promise to deliver the same level of funding to nations and regions regardless of Brexit.

Plus, Louise Blair, Covid-19 vaccine and variants leader at Airfinity, says there is more inoculation innovation to come.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
